body: Don't log game stats if player "cheats" by using the 's' key to view the AI's hand. Perhaps even add a "cheat" counter. :)
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: Don't log game stats if player "cheats"
content:
_From [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/) on September 10, 2014 21:42:44_

Don't log game stats if player "cheats" by using the 's' key to view the AI's hand. Perhaps even add a "cheat" counter. :)

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=687_
